metadata.title: CVE-2020-7677 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
This affects the package thenify before 3.3.1. The name argument providedto the package can be controlled by users without any sanitization, andthis is provided to the eval function without any sanitization.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-7677` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-thenify - 3.3.0-1+deb10u1build0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-thenify package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.3.0-1+deb10u1build0.20.04.1').
